summary: A cameraman helps a heiress to get rid off her finacial adviser, who wants to get her money.
cast: Red Skelton|Arlene Dahl|Ann Miller|Leon Ames|Pamela Britton|Richard Rober|Jack Boyle|Don Brodie|James Carlisle|Dick Cherney|James Conaty|Ray Cooke|Joseph Crehan|Redmond Doms|Paula Drew|Michael Dugan|Tom Dugan|Jacqueline Duval|Frank Ferguson|Jim Hayward|Georgia Holt|Robert Hyatt|Frank Hyers|Wendie Lee|Bill Lewin|May McAvoy|Frank Mitchell|Robert Emmett O'Connor|Kathleen O'Malley|Erin Selwyn|Jack Shea|Harry Stanton|Larry Steers|Frank Sully|Henry Sylvester|Ken Terrell|Andrew Tombes|Lurene Tuttle|Jean Vachon|Willard Waterman|Dick Wessel|Pat Williams|Wilson Wood|Jeff York
title: Watch the Birdie
